name: The Crimson Rift
description: A recent rift anomaly has opened near the Vega sector. Explorers are invited to collect readings before it collapses.

name: Eos Drift
description: A golden nebula filled with mineral-rich fragments drifts through uncharted space. Survey and collect samples.

name: Project Horizon
description: Assist in the final phase of a planetary terraforming experiment. Atmospheric stabilizers need recalibration.

name: Ophir Belt Convoy
description: Escort mining vessels through the dense Ophir asteroid belt. Expect minor debris and potential pirate interference.

name: The Silent Moon
description: An abandoned moon colony has reactivated a distress signal. Investigate and recover any surviving data cores.

name: Stellar Bloom
description: A strange bioluminescent growth has appeared near a pulsar field. Collect organic samples for research.

name: Echoes of Titan
description: Ancient alien ruins beneath Titan's ice crust have started transmitting faint energy signals.

name: Nova Dawn
description: A colony ship sustained damage during its descent. Deliver aid and help stabilize life-support systems.

name: Black Star Run
description: A high-speed hyperspace test route through the Black Star region. Precision flying and nerves of steel required.

name: Aurora Relay
description: Assist in recalibrating communication beacons within the Aurora sector. Minimal risk, high tech reward.
